languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Когда-то вы и сами{/d} переправляли грузы подобного толка. В контейнере плотно уложены еретические работы ксеносов — врагов Человечества, чьи творения, однако, неизменно вызывают достаточный интерес, чтобы чрезвычайно цениться на черном рынке.{/n}

{n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Когда-то вы и сами{/d} переправляли грузы подобного толка. В контейнере плотно уложены еретические работы ксеносов — врагов Человечества, чьи творения, однако, неизменно вызывают достаточный интерес, чтобы чрезвычайно цениться на черном рынке.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature yourself. The container is packed with heretical creations of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose works nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

{n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature yourself. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}自己{/d}以前也运输过类似的货物。这些集装箱里装的都是异形的异端造物。尽管那些异形是人类的敌人，但他们的造物始终都能在黑市上引起很多人的兴趣，可以炒到相当高的价格。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你自己以前也运输过类似的货物。这些集装箱里装的都是异形的异端造物。尽管那些异形是人类的敌人，但他们的造物始终都能在黑市上引起很多人的兴趣，可以炒到相当高的价格。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Antes {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}transportabas{/d} bienes de naturaleza similar. En el contenedor hay obras profanas de xenos, enemigos de la Humanidad cuyas creaciones siempre captan la atención suficiente como para alcanzar altos precios en el mercado negro.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Antes transportabas bienes de naturaleza similar. En el contenedor hay obras profanas de xenos, enemigos de la Humanidad cuyas creaciones siempre captan la atención suficiente como para alcanzar altos precios en el mercado negro.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなた自身{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}も同じような性質の品物を輸送したことがある{/d}。このコンテナには、人類の敵である異種族の異端の創造物が詰め込まれていて、それは依然として、闇市場で目玉が飛び出る値段で取引されるほどの人気がある。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなた自身{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}も同じような性質の品物を輸送したことがある{/d}。このコンテナには、人類の敵である異種族の異端の創造物が詰め込まれていて、それは依然として、闇市場で目玉が飛び出る値段で取引されるほどの人気がある。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du hast früher {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}selbst{/d} ähnliche Waren transportiert. Der Container ist voll mit ketzerischen Arbeiten von Xenos, Feinden der Menschheit, deren Schöpfungen aber dennoch stets so viel Interesse erzeugen, dass sie auf dem Schwarzmarkt beträchtliche Preise erzielen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du hast früher selbst ähnliche Waren transportiert. Der Container ist voll mit ketzerischen Arbeiten von Xenos, Feinden der Menschheit, deren Schöpfungen aber dennoch stets so viel Interesse erzeugen, dass sie auf dem Schwarzmarkt beträchtliche Preise erzielen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}{d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}Vous avez déjà transporté{/d} ce genre de marchandises. Le conteneur est rempli à ras bord d'œuvres hérétiques des xénos, ces ennemis de l'humanité dont les créations s'arrachent à prix d'or au marché noir.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous avez déjà transporté ce genre de marchandises. Le conteneur est rempli à ras bord d'œuvres hérétiques des xénos, ces ennemis de l'humanité dont les créations s'arrachent à prix d'or au marché noir.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Benzer nitelikteki malları zamanında {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}sen de{/d} taşımıştın. Konteyner, İnsanlığın düşmanları olan zenoların sapkın eserleriyle dolu. Bunlar karaborsada her hâlükârda muazzam bir fiyata gidecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You used to transport goods of a similar nature {d|Encyclopedia:CharGen_Criminal}yourself{/d}. The container is packed with heretical works of xenos, enemies of Humanity whose creations nonetheless never fail to arouse enough interest to fetch a tremendous price on the black market.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Benzer nitelikteki malları zamanında sen de taşıdın. Konteyner, İnsanlığın düşmanları olan zenoların, karaborsada her hâlükârda muazzam bir fiyat elde edecek sapkın eserleriyle dolu.{/n}
